cgcloud__Fund_Transaction__c.description: Reference to the custom field that stores the transaction name for which transaction rows are created.

cgcloud__Source_Fund__c.description: Reference to the source fund of the transaction.

cgcloud__Target_Fund__c.description: Reference to the target fund of the transaction.

cgcloud__Transaction_Type__c.description: This field identifies a transaction row of type Deposit or Withdraw based on either the credit or debit transaction on the target fund of the record. For example, a negative transaction on the target fund identifies a transaction row as a Withdraw type of transaction.
